snippet.title: Сreeping Dusk - Trailer
snippet.description: Step into the eerie world of Creeping Dusk, a tower defense game that blends strategic base-building and intense battles against waves of undead. Your task is to build a small town around an abandoned gold mine and defend against monsters that swarm the area. Plan your next move during the day, explore surrounding area, expand the town, fortify your defenses and prepare for the increasingly challenging nights.
